panels.title: CDC Onprem Resource Monitoring - Merged Dashboard

panels.description: Summary of onprem hosts with CDC services

targets.expr: count(count by(ophid) (onprem_host_service_status{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", service=~"cdc.*"}))
count(count by(ophid) (onprem_host_service_status{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", service=~"cdc.*"} == 1))
count(count by(ophid) (onprem_host_service_status{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", service=~"cdc.*"} == 0))

panels.title: CDC Onprem Services Summary

panels.description: Summary of customers with CDC services

targets.expr: count(count by(account_id) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}))
count(count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"}))
count(count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios))

panels.title: CDC Customers Summary

panels.description: Summary of hosts with ONLY BloxOne events (no NIOS events)

targets.expr: count(count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", source="bloxone"}) unless count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"}))

count((count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", source="bloxone"}) unless count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"})) * on(ophid) group_left(service) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 1))

count((count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", source="bloxone"}) unless count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"})) * on(ophid) group_left(service) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 0))

panels.title: Hosts with ONLY BloxOne

panels.description: Summary of hosts with ONLY NIOS (no BloxOne events)

targets.expr: count(count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"}) unless count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", source="bloxone"}))

count((count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"}) unless count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", source="bloxone"})) * on(ophid) group_left(service) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 1))

count((count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"}) unless count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", source="bloxone"})) * on(ophid) group_left(service) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 0))

panels.title: Hosts with ONLY NIOS

panels.description: Summary of hosts with BOTH BloxOne AND NIOS events

targets.expr: count(count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", source="bloxone"}) and count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"}))

count((count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", source="bloxone"}) and count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"})) * on(ophid) group_left(service) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 1))

count((count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", source="bloxone"}) and count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"})) * on(ophid) group_left(service) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 0))

panels.title: Hosts with BOTH BloxOne & NIOS

panels.description: Summary of CDC hosts with no events (neither BloxOne nor NIOS)

targets.expr: count(count by(ophid) (onprem_host_service_status{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", service=~"cdc.*"}) unless (count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", source="bloxone"}) or count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"})))

count((count by(ophid) (onprem_host_service_status{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", service=~"cdc.*"} == 1) unless (count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", source="bloxone"}) or count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"}))))

count((count by(ophid) (onprem_host_service_status{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", service=~"cdc.*"} == 0) unless (count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", source="bloxone"}) or count by(ophid) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"}))))

panels.title: CDC Hosts with No Events

panels.description: Summary of customers with ONLY BloxOne events (no NIOS events)

targets.expr: count(count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"}) unless count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios))

count((count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"}) unless count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios)) * on(account_id) group_left() (count by(account_id) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 1) > 0))

count((count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"}) unless count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios)) unless on(account_id) (count by(account_id) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 1) > 0))

panels.title: Customers with ONLY BloxOne

panels.description: Summary of customers with ONLY NIOS (no BloxOne events)

targets.expr: count(count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios) unless count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"}))

count((count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios) unless count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"})) * on(account_id) group_left() (count by(account_id) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 1) > 0))

count((count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios) unless count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"})) unless on(account_id) (count by(account_id) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 1) > 0))

panels.title: Customers with ONLY NIOS

panels.description: Summary of customers with BOTH BloxOne AND NIOS events

targets.expr: count(count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"}) and count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios))

count((count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"}) and count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios)) * on(account_id) group_left() (count by(account_id) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 1) > 0))

count((count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"}) and count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios)) unless on(account_id) (count by(account_id) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 1) > 0))

panels.title: Customers with BOTH BloxOne & NIOS

panels.description: Summary of CDC customers with no events (neither BloxOne nor NIOS)

targets.expr: count(count by(account_id) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}) unless (count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"}) or count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios)))

count((count by(account_id) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}) unless (count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"}) or count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios))) * on(account_id) group_left() (count by(account_id) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 1) > 0))

count((count by(account_id) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}) unless (count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_bloxone{source="bloxone"}) or count by(account_id) (onprem_cdc_received_events_from_nios))) unless on(account_id) (count by(account_id) (onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} == 1) > 0))

panels.title: Customers with No Events

panels.description: Shows all onprem hosts with memory usage > $memory_threshold% and CDC service running

targets.expr: onprem_host_memory_usage_total{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"} * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} and on(ophid) ((onprem_host_memory_usage_used{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"} * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}) / (onprem_host_memory_usage_total{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"} * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}) * 100 > $memory_threshold)

onprem_host_memory_usage_used{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"} * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} and on(ophid) ((onprem_host_memory_usage_used{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"} * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}) / (onprem_host_memory_usage_total{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"} * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}) * 100 > $memory_threshold)

panels.title: Onprem Hosts with Memory Usage > $memory_threshold% (CDC Service)

panels.description: Shows all onprem hosts with CPU usage > $cpu_threshold% and CDC service running
panels.title: Onprem Hosts with CPU Usage > $cpu_threshold%

panels.description: Shows all onprem hosts with volume/disk usage > $disk_threshold% and CDC service running

targets.expr: (onprem_disk_space_used{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", file_system!~"overlay.*", mount_point=~"/media/root-rw|/|/rw|/ro|/storage"} * 100 / onprem_disk_space_total{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", file_system!~"overlay.*", mount_point=~"/media/root-rw|/|/rw|/ro|/storage"} * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}) > $disk_threshold

(onprem_disk_space_total{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", file_system!~"overlay.*", mount_point=~"/media/root-rw|/|/rw|/ro|/storage"} / (1024 * 1024)) * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} and on(ophid) ((onprem_disk_space_used{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", file_system!~"overlay.*", mount_point=~"/media/root-rw|/|/rw|/ro|/storage"} * 100 / onprem_disk_space_total{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", file_system!~"overlay.*", mount_point=~"/media/root-rw|/|/rw|/ro|/storage"} * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}) > $disk_threshold)

(onprem_disk_space_used{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", file_system!~"overlay.*", mount_point=~"/media/root-rw|/|/rw|/ro|/storage"} / (1024 * 1024)) * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} and on(ophid) ((onprem_disk_space_used{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", file_system!~"overlay.*", mount_point=~"/media/root-rw|/|/rw|/ro|/storage"} * 100 / onprem_disk_space_total{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", file_system!~"overlay.*", mount_point=~"/media/root-rw|/|/rw|/ro|/storage"} * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}) > $disk_threshold)

panels.title: Onprem Hosts with Volume Usage > $disk_threshold%

panels.description: Shows hosts with continuously increasing memory usage in the last 3 hours and CDC service running

targets.expr: topk(20,(rate(onprem_host_memory_usage_used{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"}[5m]) / onprem_host_memory_usage_total{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"}) * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"} > 0.001)

onprem_host_memory_usage_used{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"} / onprem_host_memory_usage_total{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"} * 100 * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}

panels.title: Top 20 Memory Rate of Increase

panels.description: Shows hosts with continuously increasing CPU usage in the last 3 hours and CDC service running

targets.expr: onprem_cpu_percentage{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid"} * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}

panels.title: Top 20 CPU Rate of Increase

panels.description: Shows hosts with continuously increasing volume/disk usage in the last 3 hours and CDC service running

targets.expr: topk(20, rate((onprem_disk_space_used{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", file_system!~"overlay.*", mount_point=~"/media/root-rw|/|/rw|/ro|/storage"} * 100 / onprem_disk_space_total{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", file_system!~"overlay.*", mount_point=~"/media/root-rw|/|/rw|/ro|/storage"} * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"})[3h:10m]) > 0)

onprem_disk_space_used{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", file_system!~"overlay.*", mount_point=~"/media/root-rw|/|/rw|/ro|/storage"} * 100 / onprem_disk_space_total{account_id=~"$account_id", ophid=~"$ophid", file_system!~"overlay.*", mount_point=~"/media/root-rw|/|/rw|/ro|/storage"} * on(ophid) group_left(service) onprem_host_service_status{service=~"cdc.*"}

panels.title: Top 20 Volume Rate of Increase

list.description: Memory usage threshold percentage for filtering
list.label: Memory Threshold %
list.name: memory_threshold

list.description: CPU usage threshold percentage for filtering
list.label: CPU Threshold %
list.name: cpu_threshold

list.description: Volume/Disk usage threshold percentage for filtering
list.label: Volume Threshold %
list.name: disk_threshold
